name: rtorrent syntax file
description: Highlighting for the rtorrent.rc file.   Simple and effective.
install_details:
Just put the file in $HOM/.vim/syntax.   You will also need to add the following line to $VIMRUNTIME/filetype.vim, or first copy filetype.vim file to $HOME/.vim, and edit:

au BufNewFile,BufRead *rtorrent.rc* setf rtorrent
